reviews.review: This Game is a classic... can sink a lot of hours into this one~

Undeniably the most addictive and competitive FPS there ever was. You will get triggered. You will have hard-fought losses. You will tie games that should not have been. All of that is part of the grind. And I wouldn't take any of that back.
